name: Wood Golem
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine.
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: rThe golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: rThe wood golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The wood golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
